source.query:
INSERT INTO store.ecom_store_mstr ( audt_cr_dt_tm,
                                   audt_cr_id,
                                   audt_upd_dt_tm,
                                   audt_upd_id,
                                   brnd_ba_qy,
                                   cnsm_fuel_qy,
                                   cnsm_ord_lim_qy,
                                   cpn_all_spec_qy,
                                   cpn_ba_qy,
                                   cpn_cart_crs_qy,
                                   cpn_cart_max_qy,
                                   cpn_cart_qy,
                                   cpn_cart_wkly_qy,
                                   cpn_shlf_cat_qy,
                                   cpn_shlf_max_qy,
                                   cpn_vend_dc_id,
                                   cpn_vend_stat_cd,
                                   cpn_wkly_spec_qy,
                                   csi_actv_cd,
                                   dc_id,
                                   dpg_shlf_cat_qy,
                                   drvr_rvw_allw_cd,
                                   drvr_tip_allw_cd,
                                   ecom_stor_id,
                                   ecom_stor_name_tx,
                                   elec_invc_cd,
                                   epmt_disc_actv_cd,
                                   epmt_disc_qy,
                                   epmt_feat_actv_cd,
                                   epmt_time_ord_qy,
                                   fav_psn_tab_tx,
                                   fav_purc_tab_tx,
                                   fav_rfsh_day_qy,
                                   it_trk_actv_cd,
                                   list_it_disp_lg_qy,
                                   list_it_disp_sm_qy,
                                   load_cpn_actv_fl,
                                   max_days_out_qy,
                                   mgr_mail_tx,
                                   mgr_name_tx,
                                   mrch_fuel_qy,
                                   mrch_ord_lim_qy,
                                   new_ariv_days_qy,
                                   one_way_dlv_fee_qy,
                                   one_way_dlv_fl,
                                   opco_id,
                                   ord_stat_actv_cd,
                                   ord_stat_stop_qy,
                                   ortc_stor_fl,
                                   pa_actv_cd,
                                   pa_auth_days_qy,
                                   pa_cc_evry_ord_qy,
                                   pa_cc_init_ord_qy,
                                   pa_cc_ord_days_qy,
                                   pa_csv_req_cd,
                                   pa_pep_init_ord_qy,
                                   pma_id,
                                   pod_bag_fl,
                                   pr_exp_day_out_qy,
                                   pup_srch_rad_qy,
                                   root_menu_id,
                                   rte_eta_actv_cd,
                                   rte_eta_auth_cd,
                                   rtlr_card_actv_cd,
                                   rtlr_card_asgn_cd,
                                   rtlr_card_asgn_tx,
                                   rtlr_card_name_tx,
                                   rtlr_card_trk_id,
                                   rtlr_card_vald_tx,
                                   rvw_grp_cd,
                                   shlf_it_disp_lg_qy,
                                   shlf_it_disp_sm_qy,
                                   show_reg_pr_cd,
                                   snal_mail_cpn_cd,
                                   stag_only_fl,
                                   stor_stat_cd,
                                   stor_type_cd,
                                   svc_type_slct_fl,
                                   time_diff_qy,
                                   top_spec_actv_fl,
                                   tot_svgs_actv_cd,
                                   tot_svgs_disp_tx,
                                   unat_slot_allw_cd,
                                   uprm_actv_cd,
                                   web_domn_rtrn_tx,
                                   max_pers_it_qy,
                                   max_prev_ord_qy,
                                   max_pers_hdr_qy,
                                   created_ts,
                                   created_by,
                                   updated_ts,
                                   updated_by,
                                   is_processed,
                                   is_active,
                                   hash_cd)
SELECT audt_cr_dt_tm,
               audt_cr_id,
               audt_upd_dt_tm,
               audt_upd_id,
               brnd_ba_qy,
               cnsm_fuel_qy,
               cnsm_ord_lim_qy,
               cpn_all_spec_qy,
               cpn_ba_qy,
               cpn_cart_crs_qy,
               cpn_cart_max_qy,
               cpn_cart_qy,
               cpn_cart_wkly_qy,
               cpn_shlf_cat_qy,
               cpn_shlf_max_qy,
               cpn_vend_dc_id,
               cpn_vend_stat_cd,
               cpn_wkly_spec_qy,
               csi_actv_cd,
               dc_id,
               dpg_shlf_cat_qy,
               drvr_rvw_allw_cd,
               drvr_tip_allw_cd,
               ecom_stor_id,
               ecom_stor_name_tx,
               elec_invc_cd,
               epmt_disc_actv_cd,
               epmt_disc_qy,
               epmt_feat_actv_cd,
               epmt_time_ord_qy,
               fav_psn_tab_tx,
               fav_purc_tab_tx,
               fav_rfsh_day_qy,
               it_trk_actv_cd,
               list_it_disp_lg_qy,
               list_it_disp_sm_qy,
               load_cpn_actv_fl,
               max_days_out_qy,
               mgr_mail_tx,
               mgr_name_tx,
               mrch_fuel_qy,
               mrch_ord_lim_qy,
               new_ariv_days_qy,
               one_way_dlv_fee_qy,
               one_way_dlv_fl,
               opco_id,
               ord_stat_actv_cd,
               ord_stat_stop_qy,
               ortc_stor_fl,
               pa_actv_cd,
               pa_auth_days_qy,
               pa_cc_evry_ord_qy,
               pa_cc_init_ord_qy,
               pa_cc_ord_days_qy,
               pa_csv_req_cd,
               pa_pep_init_ord_qy,
               pma_id,
               pod_bag_fl,
               pr_exp_day_out_qy,
               pup_srch_rad_qy,
               root_menu_id,
               rte_eta_actv_cd,
               rte_eta_auth_cd,
               rtlr_card_actv_cd,
               rtlr_card_asgn_cd,
               rtlr_card_asgn_tx,
               rtlr_card_name_tx,
               rtlr_card_trk_id,
               rtlr_card_vald_tx,
               rvw_grp_cd,
               shlf_it_disp_lg_qy,
               shlf_it_disp_sm_qy,
               show_reg_pr_cd,
               snal_mail_cpn_cd,
               stag_only_fl,
               stor_stat_cd,
               stor_type_cd,
               svc_type_slct_fl,
               time_diff_qy,
               top_spec_actv_fl,
               tot_svgs_actv_cd,
               tot_svgs_disp_tx,
               unat_slot_allw_cd,
               uprm_actv_cd,
               web_domn_rtrn_tx,
               max_pers_it_qy,
               max_prev_ord_qy,
               max_pers_hdr_qy,
               created_ts,
               created_by,
               updated_ts,
               updated_by,
               is_processed,
               is_active,
               hash_cd            
FROM store.ecom_store_stg
WHERE is_active= True
ON CONFLICT (ecom_stor_id)
DO UPDATE SET audt_cr_dt_tm=EXCLUDED.audt_cr_dt_tm,
               audt_cr_id=EXCLUDED.audt_cr_id,
               audt_upd_dt_tm=EXCLUDED.audt_upd_dt_tm,
               audt_upd_id=EXCLUDED.audt_upd_id,
               brnd_ba_qy=EXCLUDED.brnd_ba_qy,
               cnsm_fuel_qy=EXCLUDED.cnsm_fuel_qy,
               cnsm_ord_lim_qy=EXCLUDED.cnsm_ord_lim_qy,
               cpn_all_spec_qy=EXCLUDED.cpn_all_spec_qy,
               cpn_ba_qy=EXCLUDED.cpn_ba_qy,
               cpn_cart_crs_qy=EXCLUDED.cpn_cart_crs_qy,
               cpn_cart_max_qy=EXCLUDED.cpn_cart_max_qy,
               cpn_cart_qy=EXCLUDED.cpn_cart_qy,
               cpn_cart_wkly_qy=EXCLUDED.cpn_cart_wkly_qy,
               cpn_shlf_cat_qy=EXCLUDED.cpn_shlf_cat_qy,
               cpn_shlf_max_qy=EXCLUDED.cpn_shlf_max_qy,
               cpn_vend_dc_id=EXCLUDED.cpn_vend_dc_id,
               cpn_vend_stat_cd=EXCLUDED.cpn_vend_stat_cd,
               cpn_wkly_spec_qy=EXCLUDED.cpn_wkly_spec_qy,
               csi_actv_cd=EXCLUDED.csi_actv_cd,
               dc_id=EXCLUDED.dc_id,
               dpg_shlf_cat_qy=EXCLUDED.dpg_shlf_cat_qy,
               drvr_rvw_allw_cd=EXCLUDED.drvr_rvw_allw_cd,
               drvr_tip_allw_cd=EXCLUDED.drvr_tip_allw_cd,
               ecom_stor_id=EXCLUDED.ecom_stor_id,
               ecom_stor_name_tx=EXCLUDED.ecom_stor_name_tx,
               elec_invc_cd=EXCLUDED.elec_invc_cd,
               epmt_disc_actv_cd=EXCLUDED.epmt_disc_actv_cd,
               epmt_disc_qy=EXCLUDED.epmt_disc_qy,
               epmt_feat_actv_cd=EXCLUDED.epmt_feat_actv_cd,
               epmt_time_ord_qy=EXCLUDED.epmt_time_ord_qy,
               fav_psn_tab_tx=EXCLUDED.fav_psn_tab_tx,
               fav_purc_tab_tx=EXCLUDED.fav_purc_tab_tx,
               fav_rfsh_day_qy=EXCLUDED.fav_rfsh_day_qy,
               it_trk_actv_cd=EXCLUDED.it_trk_actv_cd,
               list_it_disp_lg_qy=EXCLUDED.list_it_disp_lg_qy,
               list_it_disp_sm_qy=EXCLUDED.list_it_disp_sm_qy,
               load_cpn_actv_fl=EXCLUDED.load_cpn_actv_fl,
               max_days_out_qy=EXCLUDED.max_days_out_qy,
               mgr_mail_tx=EXCLUDED.mgr_mail_tx,
               mgr_name_tx=EXCLUDED.mgr_name_tx,
               mrch_fuel_qy=EXCLUDED.mrch_fuel_qy,
               mrch_ord_lim_qy=EXCLUDED.mrch_ord_lim_qy,
               new_ariv_days_qy=EXCLUDED.new_ariv_days_qy,
               one_way_dlv_fee_qy=EXCLUDED.one_way_dlv_fee_qy,
               one_way_dlv_fl=EXCLUDED.one_way_dlv_fl,
               opco_id=EXCLUDED.opco_id,
               ord_stat_actv_cd=EXCLUDED.ord_stat_actv_cd,
               ord_stat_stop_qy=EXCLUDED.ord_stat_stop_qy,
               ortc_stor_fl=EXCLUDED.ortc_stor_fl,
               pa_actv_cd=EXCLUDED.pa_actv_cd,
               pa_auth_days_qy=EXCLUDED.pa_auth_days_qy,
               pa_cc_evry_ord_qy=EXCLUDED.pa_cc_evry_ord_qy,
               pa_cc_init_ord_qy=EXCLUDED.pa_cc_init_ord_qy,
               pa_cc_ord_days_qy=EXCLUDED.pa_cc_ord_days_qy,
               pa_csv_req_cd=EXCLUDED.pa_csv_req_cd,
               pa_pep_init_ord_qy=EXCLUDED.pa_pep_init_ord_qy,
               pma_id=EXCLUDED.pma_id,
               pod_bag_fl=EXCLUDED.pod_bag_fl,
               pr_exp_day_out_qy=EXCLUDED.pr_exp_day_out_qy,
               pup_srch_rad_qy=EXCLUDED.pup_srch_rad_qy,
               root_menu_id=EXCLUDED.root_menu_id,
               rte_eta_actv_cd=EXCLUDED.rte_eta_actv_cd,
               rte_eta_auth_cd=EXCLUDED.rte_eta_auth_cd,
               rtlr_card_actv_cd=EXCLUDED.rtlr_card_actv_cd,
               rtlr_card_asgn_cd=EXCLUDED.rtlr_card_asgn_cd,
               rtlr_card_asgn_tx=EXCLUDED.rtlr_card_asgn_tx,
               rtlr_card_name_tx=EXCLUDED.rtlr_card_name_tx,
               rtlr_card_trk_id=EXCLUDED.rtlr_card_trk_id,
               rtlr_card_vald_tx=EXCLUDED.rtlr_card_vald_tx,
               rvw_grp_cd=EXCLUDED.rvw_grp_cd,
               shlf_it_disp_lg_qy=EXCLUDED.shlf_it_disp_lg_qy,
               shlf_it_disp_sm_qy=EXCLUDED.shlf_it_disp_sm_qy,
               show_reg_pr_cd=EXCLUDED.show_reg_pr_cd,
               snal_mail_cpn_cd=EXCLUDED.snal_mail_cpn_cd,
               stag_only_fl=EXCLUDED.stag_only_fl,
               stor_stat_cd=EXCLUDED.stor_stat_cd,
               stor_type_cd=EXCLUDED.stor_type_cd,
               svc_type_slct_fl=EXCLUDED.svc_type_slct_fl,
               time_diff_qy=EXCLUDED.time_diff_qy,
               top_spec_actv_fl=EXCLUDED.top_spec_actv_fl,
               tot_svgs_actv_cd=EXCLUDED.tot_svgs_actv_cd,
               tot_svgs_disp_tx=EXCLUDED.tot_svgs_disp_tx,
               unat_slot_allw_cd=EXCLUDED.unat_slot_allw_cd,
               uprm_actv_cd=EXCLUDED.uprm_actv_cd,
               web_domn_rtrn_tx=EXCLUDED.web_domn_rtrn_tx,
               max_pers_it_qy=EXCLUDED.max_pers_it_qy,
               max_prev_ord_qy=EXCLUDED.max_prev_ord_qy,
               max_pers_hdr_qy=EXCLUDED.max_pers_hdr_qy,
               hash_cd= EXCLUDED.hash_cd,
               is_processed=EXCLUDED.is_processed,
               is_active=EXCLUDED.is_active,
               created_by=EXCLUDED.created_by,
               created_ts=EXCLUDED.created_ts,
               updated_by=EXCLUDED.updated_by,
               updated_ts=EXCLUDED.updated_ts;
            
DELETE FROM store.ecom_store_mstr
WHERE ecom_stor_id IN (
     SELECT ecom_stor_id 
     FROM store.ecom_store_stg
     WHERE is_active=False AND is_processed=False
);

SELECT 'Upsert completed' as status;
